VisitorGenerator.PluginDescription: Create fake visits and actions in Matomo. This can be used by Matomo users or developers as an easy way to generate fake data to populate Matomo reports.
VisitorGenerator.Warning: You are about to generate fake visits which will be recorded in your Matomo database.
VisitorGenerator.NotReversible: It will %1$s not%2$s be possible to easily delete these visits from the Matomo logs.
VisitorGenerator.AreYouSure: Are you sure you want to generate fake visits?
VisitorGenerator.GenerateFakeActions: This will generate at least %d fake actions on this site for each day.
VisitorGenerator.OverwriteLogFiles: You can overwrite the log files that are used to generate fake visits (change or add files in %s). There are log files of requests to "matomo.php" in the format "Apache combined log". Plugin developers can provide their own log files by placing '*.log' files within a 'data' directory of their plugin.
VisitorGenerator.PleaseBePatient: NOTE: It might take a few minutes to generate visits and actions, please be patient...
VisitorGenerator.LogImporterNote: There is also a faster tool that will import large test data in Matomo, see the %1$sREADME%2$s.
VisitorGenerator.AutomaticReprocess: The reports will be reprocessed the next time you visit the Matomo reports, it might take a few minutes.
VisitorGenerator.GeneratedVisitsFor: Generated visits for %1$s and for the last %2$s days
VisitorGenerator.ReRunArchiveScript: Please re-run the crontab './console core:archive' command to refresh the reports. %1$sSee "How to Set up Auto-Archiving of Your Reports"%2$s
VisitorGenerator.CliToolUsage: By using the %1$sMatomo CLI tool%2$s you can not only generate even more visits but also users, websites and goals.
VisitorGenerator.ConfirmVisitorGeneration: Please confirm the visitor generation by ticking the box
